COMFORT_LABEL: How comfortable/uncomfortable do you feel right now? (click on the line below to indicate your degree of comfort or discomfort)
WETDRY_LABEL: How wet or dry does you skin feel right now? (click on the line below to indicate your feeling of wet/dry)
HOTCOLD_LABEL: How hot or cold do you feel right now? (click on the line below to indicate your feeling of hot/cold)
TEMPCHANGE_LABEL: How would you prefer the temperature in the room to be right now? (click on the line below to indicate your preference)
RSME_LABEL: Rating Scale of Mental Effort.  Please indicate, by clicking on the line below, how much effort it took for you to complete the task you've just finished (click on the line below to indicate your degree of effort)
BORG_INST1:
How much Physical Effort are you currently experiencing? This refers to your sense of PHYSICAL EXERTION — for example, how tired your body feels, how strained your muscles are, or how physically demanding the work has felt so far.
 Choose a number on the scale from 6 (“no exertion at all”) to 20 (“maximum exertion”)
BORG_EXPL_1: I am not tired; this is similar to resting.
BORG_EXPL_2: I am not tired; this is similar to walking.
BORG_EXPL_4: I am getting tired,  but I can continue.
BORG_EXPL_5: I am very tired; I have to push myself to continue.
BORG_EXPL_6: This is one of the hardest things I have done.
